description:
Aluminum stem for alloy bikes with standard oversized 31.8mm tubing.

  • 3D forged aluminum construction is light, durable and economical
  • 4 bolt handlebar design provides a solid and secure attachment
  • 2 bolt fork design ensures straight and secure clamping
  • Upward position reduces neck strain and relaxes your position
  • Downward position makes your posture more agressive
name: MEC Stem (7 Degree x 31.8mm)
